pageHeader.subtitle: Website for marketing a unique resort experience in San Francisco.
pageHeader.description: >- I worked with the designer who supplied PSD files for development. My job was to prepare the assets, code the HTML/CSS, and deploy the resort website. The site worked as a delivery tool for marketing collateral and a booking tool for the resort.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
